Uses of Package
energy.usef.core.exception

  • Packages that use energy.usef.core.exception 
    Package Description
    energy.usef.agr.controller
    Controller classes of the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.exception
    Package containing java components related to the Aggregator-specific exceptions and errors.
    energy.usef.agr.service.business
    Business classes of the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.housekeeping
    Classes implementing aggregator housekeeping.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.nonudi.goals
    Workflow classes for Non-UDI goals of the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.nonudi.initialize
    Workflow classes for Non-UDI initialization of the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.operate.deviation
    Package containing the java components needed for the 'AGR Detect deviations from Prognoses' workflow.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.operate.recreate.prognoses
    Classes for (re-)creation of prognoses in the operate phase by the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.operate.reoptimize
    Package to contain workflow logic around Determining Net Demands
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.plan.connection.profile
    Workflow classes for connection profiles in the plan phase of the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.plan.create.aplan
    Classes for creation of A-plans in the plan phase by the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.plan.recreate.aplan
    Classes for creation of A-plans in the plan phase by the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.validate.create.dprognosis
    Package containing the java components needed for the 'Create and Send D-Prognosis' workflow.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.validate.flexoffer
    This package contains the logic to create and send FlexOffer's
    energy.usef.brp.controller
    Controller classes of the Balance Responsible Party.
    energy.usef.brp.exception  
    energy.usef.brp.service.business
    The package which contains all the business services for the BRP.
    energy.usef.brp.workflow.housekeeping
    Classes implementing balance responsible party housekeeping.
    energy.usef.brp.workflow.plan.aplan.finalize
    Workflow classes for A-plan finalization in the plan phase of the BRP.
    energy.usef.brp.workflow.plan.aplan.missing  
    energy.usef.brp.workflow.plan.connection.forecast
    Connection forecast classes of the Balance Responsible Party.
    energy.usef.brp.workflow.plan.flexoffer.revoke
    Classes for flexoffer revocation in the plan phase by the Balance Responsible Party.
    energy.usef.core.controller
    Controller classes for the transport core.
    energy.usef.core.controller.error
    Package which contains the controller handling errors.
    energy.usef.core.event.validation  
    energy.usef.core.exception
    Exception classes.
    energy.usef.core.service.business
    Package for the core business service classes.
    energy.usef.core.service.business.error  
    energy.usef.core.service.helper
    Helper classes for the transport core.
    energy.usef.core.service.rest.sender.error
    Sender error classes for the transport core.
    energy.usef.core.service.validation
    Package for global business validations.
    energy.usef.core.workflow.exception
    Exception classes for the workflow.
    energy.usef.cro.controller
    Controller classes for the Common Reference Operator.
    energy.usef.cro.service.business
    Business classes of the Common Reference Operator.
    energy.usef.dso.controller
    Controller classes of the Distribution System Operator.
    energy.usef.dso.exception
    Contains the enumeration of possible DSO-related exceptions and errors.
    energy.usef.dso.service.business
    Business classes of the Distribution System Operator.
    energy.usef.dso.workflow.coloring
    Classes to implement regime transitions (green/yellow/orange/red) for the DSO.
    energy.usef.dso.workflow.housekeeping
    Classes implementing distribution system operator housekeeping.
    energy.usef.dso.workflow.operate
    Operate classes of the Distribution System Operator.
    energy.usef.dso.workflow.validate.create.flexrequest
    This package contains the components needed for the implementation of the 'Create Flex Requests' DSO workflow.
    energy.usef.dso.workflow.validate.gridsafetyanalysis
    Grid safety analysis classes of the Distribution System Operator.
    energy.usef.mdc.controller
    Contains Controller Classes.
    energy.usef.mdc.service.business
    Contains BusinessService classes.
